verses.roman:
tabe miśra viśvarūpera dekhiyā yauvana
kanyā cāhi' vivāha dite karilena mana

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; miśra—Jagannātha Miśra; viśvarūpera—of Viśvarūpa, his elder son; dekhiyā—seeing; yauvana—youthfulness; kanyā cāhi'-wanting to find a girl; vivāha—marriage; dite—to give; karilena—made up; mana—his mind.
translation: Thereafter, seeing that Viśvarūpa was a grown-up youth, Jagannātha Miśra wanted to find a girl and arrange a marriage ceremony for Him.
